supportingMedia.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

exploit.value: Juniper SIRT is not aware of any malicious exploitation of this vulnerability.

supportingMedia.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: 21.4R3-S6-EVO, 22.1R3-S5-EVO, 22.2R2-S1-EVO, 22.2R3-EVO, 22.3R2-EVO, 22.4R1-EVO, and all subsequent releases.

solution.value: The following software releases have been updated to resolve this specific issue: 21.4R3-S6-EVO, 22.1R3-S5-EVO, 22.2R2-S1-EVO, 22.2R3-EVO, 22.3R2-EVO, 22.4R1-EVO, and all subsequent releases.

supportingMedia.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.

work_around.value: There are no known workarounds for this issue.
